Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.apache.ignite.cache.affinity.AffinityNodeHashResolver
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setConsistentId(Serializable) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.stream.StreamTupleExtractor
    Will be removed in 2.0.0.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.apache.ignite.cache.affinity.AffinityNodeAddressHashResolver
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setConsistentId(Serializable) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.affinity.AffinityNodeIdHashResolver
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setConsistentId(Serializable) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.CacheTypeMetadata
    Use QueryEntity instead.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.eviction.random.RandomEvictionPolicy
    This eviction policy implementation doesn't support near cache and doesn't work on client nodes. Also it seems that random eviction doesn't make sense.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_PUBLIC_KEEP_ALIVE_TIME
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_PUBLIC_THREADPOOL_QUEUE_CAP
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.DFLT_REBALANCE_THREAD_POOL_SIZE

    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_SYSTEM_MAX_THREAD_CNT
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_SYSTEM_THREADPOOL_QUEUE_CAP
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_UTILITY_KEEP_ALIVE_TIME
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_BINARY_DONT_WRAP_TREE_STRUCTURES
    Should be removed in Apache Ignite 2.0.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_BINARY_SORT_OBJECT_FIELDS
    Should be removed in Apache Ignite 2.0.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_MIN_BUFFERED_COMMUNICATION_MSG_CNT
    Not used anymore.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_UNWRAP_BINARY_FOR_INDEXING_SPI
    Should be removed in Apache Ignite 2.0.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.apache.ignite.spi.IgniteSpiContext.addMessageListener(GridMessageListener, String)
    Use IgniteSpiContext.addLocalMessageListener(Object, IgniteBiPredicate) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.communication.tcp.TcpCommunicationSpiMBean.getConnectionBufferFlushFrequency()
    Not used anymore.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.communication.tcp.TcpCommunicationSpi.getConnectionBufferFlushFrequency()
    org.apache.ignite.spi.communication.tcp.TcpCommunicationSpiMBean.getConnectionBufferSize()
    Not used anymore.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.communication.tcp.TcpCommunicationSpi.getConnectionBufferSize()
    org.apache.ignite.yarn.ApplicationMaster.getContainers()
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.FileSystemConfiguration.getDualModeMaxPendingPutsSize()
    Not used any more.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.FileSystemConfiguration.getDualModePutExecutorService()
    Not used any more.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.FileSystemConfiguration.getDualModePutExecutorServiceShutdown()
    Not used any more.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.FileSystemConfiguration.getFragmentizerLocalWritesRatio()
    Parameter is no longer used.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.affinity.rendezvous.RendezvousAffinityFunction.getHashIdResolver()
    org.apache.ignite.spi.communication.tcp.TcpCommunicationSpiMBean.getMinimumBufferedMessageCount()
    Not used anymore.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.communication.tcp.TcpCommunicationSpi.getMinimumBufferedMessageCount()
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.getNodeId()
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.getRebalanceThreadPoolSize()
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.ConnectorConfiguration.getSslContextFactory()
    Use ConnectorConfiguration.getSslFactory() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.getTransactionManagerLookupClassName()
    Use TransactionConfiguration.getTxManagerFactory() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.FileSystemConfiguration.getTrashPurgeTimeout()
    Not used any more.
    org.apache.ignite.stream.StreamAdapter.getTupleExtractor()
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.TransactionConfiguration.getTxManagerLookupClassName()
    Use TransactionConfiguration.getTxManagerFactory() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.platform.dotnet.PlatformDotNetBinaryTypeConfiguration.isKeepDeserialized()
    Use PlatformDotNetBinaryTypeConfiguration.getKeepDeserialized() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.igfs.IgfsPath.isSame(IgfsPath)
    Use IgfsPath.equals(Object) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.TransactionConfiguration.isTxSerializableEnabled()
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteCluster.mapKeysToNodes(String, Collection)
    Use Affinity.mapKeysToNodes(Collection) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteCluster.mapKeyToNode(String, K)
    Use Affinity.mapKeyToNode(Object) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteCache.randomEntry()
    org.apache.ignite.spi.IgniteSpiContext.removeMessageListener(GridMessageListener, String)
    Use IgniteSpiContext.removeLocalMessageListener(Object, IgniteBiPredicate) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.affinity.AffinityNodeHashResolver.resolve(ClusterNode)
    org.apache.ignite.igfs.IgfsPath.root()
    Use IgfsPath.ROOT instead.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.store.CacheStore.sessionEnd(boolean)
    Use CacheStoreSessionListener instead (refer to its JavaDoc for details).
    org.apache.ignite.cache.affinity.rendezvous.RendezvousAffinityFunction.setBackupFilter(IgniteBiPredicate)
    Use affinityBackupFilter instead.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.affinity.fair.FairAffinityFunction.setBackupFilter(IgniteBiPredicate)
    Use affinityBackupFilter instead.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.communication.tcp.TcpCommunicationSpiMBean.setConnectionBufferFlushFrequency(long)
    Not used anymore.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.communication.tcp.TcpCommunicationSpi.setConnectionBufferFlushFrequency(long)
    org.apache.ignite.spi.communication.tcp.TcpCommunicationSpi.setConnectionBufferSize(int)
    Not used any more.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.store.jdbc.CacheJdbcPojoStoreFactory.setDataSource(DataSource)
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.FileSystemConfiguration.setDualModeMaxPendingPutsSize(long)
    Not used any more.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.FileSystemConfiguration.setDualModePutExecutorService(ExecutorService)
    Not used any more.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.FileSystemConfiguration.setDualModePutExecutorServiceShutdown(boolean)
    Not used any more.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.FileSystemConfiguration.setFragmentizerLocalWritesRatio(float)
    Parameter is no longer used.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.affinity.rendezvous.RendezvousAffinityFunction.setHashIdResolver(AffinityNodeHashResolver)
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setConsistentId(Serializable) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setMarshallerCachePoolSize(int)
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setMarshallerCacheThreadPoolSize(int) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.communication.tcp.TcpCommunicationSpi.setMinimumBufferedMessageCount(int)
    Not used any more.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setNodeId(UUID)
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setConsistentId(Serializable) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.setRebalanceThreadPoolSize(int)
    org.apache.ignite.cache.query.ContinuousQuery.setRemoteFilter(CacheEntryEventSerializableFilter)
    Use ContinuousQuery.setRemoteFilterFactory(Factory) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.ConnectorConfiguration.setSslContextFactory(GridSslContextFactory)
    Use ConnectorConfiguration.setSslFactory(Factory) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.setTransactionManagerLookupClassName(String)
    Use TransactionConfiguration.setTxManagerFactory(Factory) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.FileSystemConfiguration.setTrashPurgeTimeout(long)
    Not used any more.
    org.apache.ignite.stream.StreamAdapter.setTupleExtractor(StreamTupleExtractor)
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.TransactionConfiguration.setTxManagerLookupClassName(String)
    Use TransactionConfiguration.setTxManagerFactory(Factory) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.TransactionConfiguration.setTxSerializableEnabled(boolean)
    This method has no effect, TransactionIsolation.SERIALIZABLE isolation is always enabled.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.setTypeMetadata(Collection)
    Use CacheConfiguration.setQueryEntities(java.util.Collection) instead.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.apache.ignite.igfs.IgfsPath()
    Use IgfsPath.ROOT instead.

    Use IgniteHadoopIgfsSecondaryFileSystem.getFileSystemFactory() instead.

    Use IgniteHadoopIgfsSecondaryFileSystem.getFileSystemFactory() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.hadoop.fs.IgniteHadoopIgfsSecondaryFileSystem(String, String, String)
    Use IgniteHadoopIgfsSecondaryFileSystem.getFileSystemFactory() instead.
